attributes.comment:
With all of the taxes we pay we can not understand how you can find it
NECESSARY to increase the costs related to adoption. If it were cheaper to
adopt in this country you would have even fewer people on welfare (what a
concept). Please - we're not asking for you to make it cheaper - just DON'T
RAISE the costs. Aside from the few Hollywood do-gooders, it's the middle class
in this country that does nearly all of the adopting. We are already shouldering
more than our share of the burdens required to work hard and prosper in this great
country. Please don't make it more costly to adopt.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Karl & Julie Voelkel
